title: Pearl Harbor survivor recalls day of infamy
content:
On the morning of Dec. 7, 1941, U.S. Army Air Corps Tech. Sgt. Durward Swanson had just taken his shirt off and laid down in his bed when he came face-to-face with a Japanese Zero fighter plane.
